description:
At Karner Girls Academy, Rock was the only male; believed to be a dragon man, he is given special treatment.

A female student trying to seduce Rock for his dragon seed; a female doctor devoting herself to Rock in order to determine his identity...

A crafty and unruly Lolita princess, a sexy and beautiful female doctor, a bold and unrestrained female student, a gun wielding Lolita nun, a dubious female teacher...

Sloppy Rock just wants to embrace beautiful women, but he himself doesn’t know what his true identity is...>
